ticket_requirements.feature_description: Allow agents to select multiple tickets from the list view and assign them all at once to a chosen agent
ticket_requirements.deadline_context: Team scaling initiative - need to handle 2x ticket volume
ticket_requirements.problem_statement: Agents currently have to assign tickets one at a time, which is time-consuming when handling triage for incoming ticket spikes
functional_requirements: Select multiple tickets via checkboxes in list view
Assign all selected tickets to a chosen agent from a dropdown
Display notification when assignment is complete
ticket_requirements.user_workflow: Agent goes to ticket list, filters for unassigned tickets, selects 10+ tickets via checkboxes, clicks 'Bulk Assign', selects agent, confirms
ticket_requirements.user_inputs: Checkbox selections, agent selection from dropdown
ticket_requirements.expected_outputs: All selected tickets show updated assigned_agent_id
edge_cases: Handle tickets already assigned to other agents
Handle permission errors if agent lacks access
ticket_requirements.ui_requirements: Checkbox column in list view, 'Bulk Assign' button appears when tickets selected, modal for agent selection
ticket_requirements.displayed_information: Selected ticket count, agent dropdown, confirmation summary
ticket_requirements.reference_features: Similar to Gmail bulk move functionality
ticket_requirements.data_requirements: Need to store assigned_agent_id, assignment_timestamp, assigned_by_user_id
acceptance_criteria: Audit trail created for each assignment
ticket_requirements.definition_of_done: Feature deployed, tested with 50+ tickets, documentation updated
ticket_requirements.additional_notes: Consider adding bulk actions for status changes in future iteration

pain_points.problem: Can't filter by multiple categories at once
pain_points.example: Wanted to see Hardware AND Software tickets, but filter only allows one category
pain_points.impact: Have to switch between filters or use list view scrolling

pain_points.problem: No way to quickly navigate between tickets
pain_points.example: After resolving a ticket, have to go back to list view to find next one
pain_points.impact: Adds ~10 seconds per ticket, which adds up over 50+ tickets daily

pain_points.problem: Search doesn't find partial matches in ticket descriptions

workflow_inefficiencies.current_steps: Open ticket > click assign > select agent > save > repeat for each ticket

workflow_inefficiencies.task: Finding tickets from a specific customer
workflow_inefficiencies.current_steps: Click customer name, see their tickets, but can't filter or sort
workflow_inefficiencies.suggested_improvement: Add filter and sort options to customer ticket view

missing_features.envisioned_usage: Save my common filters like 'High priority, unassigned Hardware tickets'
See my open ticket count, average resolution time, etc.
Quick insert common responses like 'Thank you for contacting support'

user_feedback.top_suggestion: Add bulk assignment capability - this is the biggest time saver for our team
user_feedback.additional_comments: Overall happy with the system. These improvements would make it much more efficient for high-volume agents.
